Package beans.crawlerBuilder

Interface CrawlerBuilder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleCrawlerBuilder
    public interface CrawlerBuilder
    Basic builder template interface for creating an Crawler object

    1.0
    Author:
    Verbitsky Segey
    See Also:
    Crawler

    • Method Detail

      • setStartURL

        void setStartURL​(java.lang.String seed)
        Sets the start page for scanning

      • setVisitedPagesLimit

        void setVisitedPagesLimit​(int pagesLimit)
        Sets the count of scanning pages

      • setDepthLink

        void setDepthLink​(int depth)
        Sets the depth of visited pages. Link depth is the number of clicks required to reach a given page from the home page

      • setParallelMode

        void setParallelMode​(boolean mode)
        sets the use of multithreading when scanning pages.
        Parameters:
        mode - - defines the need for multithreading. True - enable false - disable

      • setSearchWords

        void setSearchWords​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> words)
        sets the list of searched words
        Parameters:
        words - - contains searching words
